components.description:
A plain t-shirt, that can be worn by men or women. Displayed as a blue polo shirt on iOS, a light blue ringer t-shirt on Android, Samsung and Windows, or a standard green tee on other platforms.

The Facebook version of this emoji previously had a capital H on the front.
components.title: T-Shirt

description:
A plain t-shirt, that can be worn by men or women. Displayed as a blue polo shirt on iOS, a light blue ringer t-shirt on Android, Samsung and Windows, or a standard green tee on other platforms.

The Facebook version of this emoji previously had a capital H on the front.
title: T-Shirt

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Clothing and accessories
emoji_net_data.definition: A plain t-shirt, that can be worn by men or women. Displayed as a blue polo shirt on iOS, Facebook and Firefox OS. A white t-shirt on Androi http://emojipedia.org/t-shirt/
emoji_net_data.name: t-shirt

bn:00099072a: Furnished or closed with buttons or something buttonlike

bn:00006125n: Clothing is material used to cover parts of the human body for protection against the environment, for comfort and body modesty, and as personal decoration, often reflecting religious, cultural, and social customs.
Clothing is fiber and textile material worn on the body.
All coverings designed to be worn on a person's body.
Something that can be worn; an item of clothing.
A covering of or like clothing.
An act or instance of putting clothes on.
A covering designed to be worn on a person's body
Fiber and textile material worn on the body

bn:00019980n: A woven fabric such as used in dressing, decorating, cleaning or other practical use.
A material made of fibers, a textile or cloth.
A material made of natural or man-made fibers and used for the manufacture of items such as clothing and furniture fittings.
A textile or cloth is a flexible woven material consisting of a network of natural or artificial fibers often referred to as thread or yarn.
Any cloth made from yarn or fibres by weaving, knitting, felting, etc.
Artifact made by weaving or felting or knitting or crocheting natural or synthetic fibers
Any type of material made from fibers or other extended linear materials such as thread or yarn.

bn:00063393n: A shirt with short sleeves designed for comfort and casual wear
A polo shirt, also known as a golf shirt and tennis shirt, is a form of shirt with a collar, a placket with typically two or three buttons, and an optional pocket.
Also known as a tennis shirt or golf shirt

bn:00033731n: Fashion refers to styles of dress that are popular in a culture at any given time.
The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior
Term for a popular style or practice in clothing, make-up, furniture, etc.
The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior.
Fashion is a popular style or practice, especially in clothing, footwear, accessories, makeup, body piercing, or furniture.
A prevailing mode of expression, e.g., clothing

bn:00071142n: An article of clothing that is worn on the upper part of the body, and often has sleeves, either long or short, that cover the arms.
A shirt is a cloth garment for the upper body.
A garment worn on the upper half of the body
Cloth garment for the upper body

bn:00048144n: A jersey is an item of knitted clothing, traditionally in wool or cotton, with sleeves, worn as a pullover, as it does not open at the front, unlike a cardigan.
A piece of clothing with short sleeves, a round or V-shaped neckline, without collars, pockets or buttons
A t-shirt that has had the sleeves removed.
A T-shirt is a style of fabric shirt, named after the T shape of the body and sleeves.
A thick, warm piece of clothing with long sleeves which is put on over the head.
A lightweight shirt without buttons, with short sleeves and no collar.
A lightweight shirt without buttons, with short sleeves and no collar. Often made of cotton and frequently bears a picture or slogan.
A knitted jacket or jersey, usually of thick wool, worn by athletes before or after exercise.
